title: Inquiry-Based Collaborative Learning Design and Diffusion Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and possession of job-specific professional knowledge
context.additional_context: Program for vocational institutions targeting professionals (medical/legal/technical) to strengthen math-based problem-solving. Utilizes VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology settings

learning_goals: Learners can independently conduct inquiry-based learning design in a simulation environment reflecting real-world job situations
Through collaborative learning activities, learners experience knowledge sharing with peers and the design improvement process
Learners apply mathematical problem-solving strategies using digital tools (smartphones/VR) to produce project outcomes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
